name: alee-prod-website
description: A rewrite of the old aleecorp.github.io website

scripts.start: concurrently "node-sass --omit-source-map-url public/css/style.scss public/css/style.css ", "node-sass public/css/style.scss -o public/css -w", "node app"
scripts.dev: concurrently "node-sass --omit-source-map-url public/css/style.scss public/css/style.css ", "node-sass public/css/style.scss -o public/css -w", "nodemon app"

author: Alee
